title: UFO Code Released: Sergeant Claims Message From Year 8100 Was 'Downloaded' Into His Mind
description: A disputed UFO claim resurfaces as a US Air Force sergeant alleges a binary message from the year 8100 was mentally received during the Rendlesham Forest incident.

title: TAT Harnesses UFO Enthusiasm and Nighttime Economy to Drive Tourism Revenue to 3 Trillion Baht by 2026
description: TAT plans to enhance Thailand's tourism through wellness packages, strategic marketing, and niche events like a UFO Festival, while focusing on quality experiences, safety, and sustainable practices for 2026.

title: Mozibul Hoque elected chairman of UAP Board of Trustees
description: Unanimously elected, Mr Hoque will lead UAP boards, bringing extensive experience in education, business, and international leadershipDetails

title: CIA won't deny it has 3I/Atlas records monitoring mystery suspected UFO
description: The mystery surrounding the suspected UFO the 3I/Atlas space object has deepened as the CIA has refused to disclose if they have documents monitoring space object

title: World : German UFO Centre LoggedÂ Record Number Of Sightings In 2025
description: WIESBADEN (Germany), Jan 6 (Bernama-dpa) -- The UFO reporting centre CENAP located in western Germany this year recorded more sightings by puzzled citizens than ever before, its director said on Monday, reported German Press Agency (dpa).
